object.name: User
object.description: This object represents a Telegram user or bot.
object.html_description: This object represents a Telegram user or bot.
object.rst_description: This object represents a Telegram user or bot.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for this user or bot. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for this user or bot. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for this user or bot. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.
annotations.name: id

annotations.description: True, if this user is a bot
annotations.html_description: True, if this user is a bot
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if this user is a bot
annotations.name: is_bot

annotations.description: IETF language tag of the user's language
annotations.html_description: Optional. IETF language tag of the user's language
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. `IETF language tag <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IETF_language_tag>`_ of the user's language
annotations.name: language_code

annotations.description: True, if this user is a Telegram Premium user
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if this user is a Telegram Premium user
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if this user is a Telegram Premium user
annotations.name: is_premium

annotations.description: True, if this user added the bot to the attachment menu
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if this user added the bot to the attachment menu
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if this user added the bot to the attachment menu
annotations.name: added_to_attachment_menu

annotations.description: True, if the bot can be invited to groups. Returned only in getMe.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can be invited to groups. Returned only in getMe.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the bot can be invited to groups. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_me.GetMe`.
annotations.name: can_join_groups

annotations.description: True, if privacy mode is disabled for the bot. Returned only in getMe.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if privacy mode is disabled for the bot. Returned only in getMe.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if `privacy mode <https://core.telegram.org/bots/features#privacy-mode>`_ is disabled for the bot. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_me.GetMe`.
annotations.name: can_read_all_group_messages

annotations.description: True, if the bot supports inline queries. Returned only in getMe.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot supports inline queries. Returned only in getMe.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the bot supports inline queries. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_me.GetMe`.
annotations.name: supports_inline_queries

annotations.description: True, if the bot can be connected to a Telegram Business account to receive its messages. Returned only in getMe.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can be connected to a Telegram Business account to receive its messages. Returned only in getMe.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the bot can be connected to a Telegram Business account to receive its messages. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_me.GetMe`.
annotations.name: can_connect_to_business

annotations.description: True, if the bot has a main Web App. Returned only in getMe.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot has a main Web App. Returned only in getMe.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the bot has a main Web App. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_me.GetMe`.
annotations.name: has_main_web_app

annotations.description: True, if the bot has forum topic mode enabled in private chats. Returned only in getMe.
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot has forum topic mode enabled in private chats. Returned only in getMe.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the bot has forum topic mode enabled in private chats. Returned only in :class:`aiogram.methods.get_me.GetMe`.
annotations.name: has_topics_enabled
